title: Surf and Snow
content:
From early this morning on the Atlantic.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015063149im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC_2585bwsm_6422.jpg)

.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015063149im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC_2542sm_4960.jpg)
author: Sharon Van Lieu

comments.content:
now i'm jealous!!  
this seems so romantic and reminds me of "eternal sunshine of the spotless mind".
I'm a fan. Can I be your roadie?

Sharon, Tell Tiff how cold it is in the Atlantic in January and see if she still wants the job :-)

ChrisL

This is our first really cold spell. It's been a mild winter so far. I was pretty desperate to get some snow! Tiffany, some day we'll have a good shoot together.

Sharon
